name: Pew Pew Rocket
description: Pew Pew Rocket is a beautiful and spectacular space survival shoot em up with a twist, Instead of lasers and explosions, it combines a beat style game-play such as guitar hero and beautiful firework effects to have you mesmerized!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Standard HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound card or motherboard sound port Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
